SECTION_ONE.INTRO:
My roots are at Catania, where I was born at the early 1993. 

 I lived for nearly 24 years in a near village called Misterbianco with my family, my brothers and my sister

SECTION_THREE.DESC: I live at Milano, where I work in a IT consulting company. During my spare time I go to discover new places, I do bodybuilding and watch TV series (maybe I'm forgetting something...)
SECTION_THREE.TITLE: Currently

SECTION_TWO.DESC: Following my passions, I enrolled to the University of Catania to get, first, the Computer Engineering Bachelor's Degree then the Master's Degree for a total of 5 years
SECTION_TWO.TITLE: My studies

COUNTRY.TEXT: Here there're some of the cities I visited in {{ value }}. Click one of those to see some of my shots

TRAVEL.INTRODUCTION: My life is based on my travels, here there're countries I visited during my spare time. They'll increase in the future
